title: Braintree payment method
name: Braintree
description: Braintree payment method to accept credit cards
author: ImpressPages

options.html:
Please visit Braintree website and create account. Then fill in the data bellow. You can have two separate accounts for testing and production modes.

This is just the payment method. Please install SimpleProduct or other plugin to actually sell something.

options.label: Braintree account currency
options.name: currency
options.note: Has to be the same as used on Braintree account.

options.label: Braintree merchant ID (test mode)
options.name: testMerchantId
options.note: The one you create in Braintree sandbox

options.label: Braintree public key (test mode)
options.name: testPublicKey
options.note: The one you create in Braintree sandbox

options.label: Braintree private key (test mode)
options.name: testPrivateKey
options.note: The one you create in Braintree sandbox
